FuncDef:
The qos-profile command creates a QoS profile and enter the qos-profile view.
The undo qos-profile command removes the QoS profile.
By default, a QoS profile is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a QoS profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can configure scheduling parameters for a queue in a QoS profile, including the CIR, PIR, FQ profile, CAR, and Layer 2 suppression configurations.
Precautions
A maximum of 4094 QoS profiles can be created in the system. A QoS profile that has been applied to an interface cannot be deleted.
Only a flow queue profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode can be bound to a QoS profile in enhanced 8-CoS mode.
